bill.title: Health facilities; certificate of need; requirement to obtain a certificate of need; eliminate. Amends secs. 2612, 20101, 20115, 20145, 20155, 20161, 20164, 20165, 20166, 21551, 21562 & 21563 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.2612 et seq.); repeals sec. 20143 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.20143); repeals sec. 21420 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.21420); repeals pt. 222 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.22201 - 333.22260); repeals sec. 8t of 1945 PA 47 (MCL 331.8t) & repeals sec. 47 of 1969 PA 38 (MCL 331.77).
bill.description: Health facilities; certificate of need; requirement to obtain a certificate of need; eliminate. Amends secs. 2612, 20101, 20115, 20145, 20155, 20161, 20164, 20165, 20166, 21551, 21562 & 21563 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.2612 et seq.); repeals sec. 20143 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.20143); repeals sec. 21420 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.21420); repeals pt. 222 of 1978 PA 368 (MCL 333.22201 - 333.22260); repeals sec. 8t of 1945 PA 47 (MCL 331.8t) & repeals sec. 47 of 1969 PA 38 (MCL 331.77).

history.action: Referred To Committee On Health Policy
